document_data.name: Krak al-Yinangi
document_data.source: [[A Dozen and One Adventures|A Dozen and One Adventures (Campaign Book)]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Krak al-Yinangi''', also called the '''Castle of Conveyance''', was a fortress located in [[Muluk]], the City of Kings, in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description: This beautiful but stout bridge-like fortress was designed to appear to float upon the lagoon where it sat.
document_data.Activities: Anyone wishing to visit the grand palace needed to first pass through the Castle of Conveyance.
